row.text: Petro, tit. S. Chrysogoni presbytero cardinali, apostolicae sedis legato, mandat, commoneat (Henricum), archiepiscopum Remensem, et eius suffraganeos, ut interfectores R(oberti) electi Cameracensis excommunicent. Duchesne H. Fr. SS. IV. 565, Bouquet Rec. XV. 949, (Mansi XXI. 969, Migne 200 p. 1014). — „Non sine gravi dolore“.
